title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define the project scope, objectives, and requirements for the TeamSynergyMetrics dashboard. Conduct stakeholder interviews and gather user stories.

title: Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the data model, backend services, frontend components, and infrastructure. Define the technology stack, integration points, and deployment strategy. Consider scalability, maintainability, and performance requirements, with a focus on using microservices for better modularity, and employing cloud-native technologies such as Kubernetes, Docker, and AWS for scalable and efficient infrastructure.

title: Data Modeling and Database Design
description: Design the database schema and data structures to store team collaboration data, communication logs, and productivity metrics.

title: Backend Development
description: Implement the backend services for data ingestion, processing, and API endpoints to serve the frontend.

title: Frontend Development
description: Design and implement the user interface for the TeamSynergyMetrics dashboard, including data visualization components and user interactions.

title: Data Integration and ETL
description: Develop processes to extract data from various sources (e.g., communication tools, project management systems), transform it into a standardized format, and load it into the database.

title: Security and Access Control
description: Implement authentication (login system) and authorization mechanisms (role-based access control) to secure the dashboard, ensure data privacy, and provide access control based on user roles and permissions. Collaborate with Architecture Design, Backend Development, and Frontend Development teams for a cohesive solution. Ensure the design adheres to industry-standard security practices and is scalable, efficient, and maintainable.

title: Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Set up a CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deployment of the TeamSynergyMetrics application.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop and execute test plans for unit, integration, and end-to-end testing of the TeamSynergyMetrics dashboard. Ensure quality standards are met.

title: Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation, including installation guides, user manuals, and API references for the TeamSynergyMetrics dashboard.
